LanguageData.Apparel_TacVest.label: Loadbearing Kit
LanguageData.Apparel_TacVest.description: A loadbearing vest with a number of pouches to store magazines and other equipment.\n\nSpeeds up reloading but is quite bulky to wear.
LanguageData.Apparello_Ammobelt.label: Ammo belt
LanguageData.Apparel_Backpack.label: Backpack
LanguageData.Apparel_Backpack.description: A comfortable and spacious backpack for storing all kinds of items.
LanguageData.Apparel_TribalBackpack.label: tribal backpack
LanguageData.Apparel_TribalBackpack.description: Primitive backpack made from animal furs, useful for storing items when travelling.
